testimonials.upperText: Professional team of specialists and passionate mentors at reach
testimonials.middleText: I need to get a certification for English proficiency and MaxCoach is my best choice. The tutors are smart and professional when dealing with students.
testimonials.name: Madley Pondor

testimonials.upperText: High level of efficiency and scientific teaching methods
testimonials.middleText: I am free to learn at my own pace, follow my own schedule and choose the subject I want to learn from the syllabys. Great study portal for people like me.
testimonials.name: Mina Hollace

testimonials.upperText: The MaxCoach team works really hard to ensure high level of quality
